TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit TypedDataSetSchemaImporterExtension extends System.Xml.Serialization.Advanced.SchemaImporterExtension

summary.span: 針對 XML 結構描述項目宣告產生 .NET Framework 型別的內部對應，包括 WSDL 文件中的常值 (Literal) XSD 訊息部分。

span.span: Generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 展開時的具類型資料集提供額外的功能。Expands upon the to provide additional functionality for typed datasets.

remarks.format: ## Remarks > [!IMPORTANT] > 呼叫此方法不受信任的資料時，會造成安全性風險。Calling this method with untrusted data is a security risk. 呼叫這個方法僅使用信任的資料。Call this method only with trusted data. 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[資料驗證](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation)。For more information, see [Data Validation](https://www.owasp.org/index.php/Data_Validation). 展開時提供型別資料集的額外功能，並產生 XML 結構描述項目宣告，包括 WSDL 文件中的常值的 XSD 訊息部分的.NET Framework 型别的內部對應。Expands upon the to provide additional functionality for typed datasets and generates internal mappings to .NET Framework types for XML schema element declarations, including literal XSD message parts in a WSDL document.
